reviewtext: Small office, 3 machines linked on one phone line (which is also fax line), 2 Win98s, 1 Win95.  Hardest to set up with Win95.  For some reason driver did not seem to want to load.  I had to completely uninstall network components and reinstall, then install driver manually.  Worked after that.  Think it was a comflict with a Bios setting but never confirmed it.
summary: Works Fine-- Some Problems With Win 95 Driver
